title: Visit Marymoor Park and Lake Sammamish
posting_body: WELCOME TO ALLEZ APARTMENTS
We are now offering touchless tours in addition to virtual tours.
Schedule your visit to Allez today!
Let's Go Redmond!
Allez! v. French for “Let’s Go!” is a term used to encourage or cheer on cyclists and adventurist alike.
It is also a perfect description for the lifestyle you can obtain while living at Allez.
Work, play, and live the active Northwest lifestyle—Allez offers location, sport, and style.
Located on the Sammamish River in the booming City of Redmond, Allez combines the beauty of the outdoors with the hum of the big city.
Modern architectural design, direct access to the famous Burke-Gilman trail and a short walk to downtown shops & restaurants makes Allez a home like no other.
Modern Living, Naturally!
Great design is in the details and none have been overlooked at Allez.
Modern architecture with detail-driven finishes and unique amenities make Allez not just a home but a lifestyle.
We’ve made individuality a component of the design.
At Allez, choose between one-bedroom, two-bedrooms, lofts and townhomes.
Unique details such as garage-door windows open up your space and offer something truly special in apartment living.

This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 755 Sq.
Ft.
Features
- Ceramic-top ranges
- Energy Star rated stainless steel appliances
- Ample storage
- Expansive windows for more natural light
- Balconies and walk-in closets
- Full size washer and dryer in every unit
- Hardwood flooring
- Kitchen islands for extra counter space for gourmet cooking
- Two interior finish options to match your personal style
- Cable service for high speed internet access
- Custom cabinetry with Corian countertops in kitchen and bathrooms
- Unique floor plans that take advantage of available light and views
- High ceilings for a spacious feel
Community Amenities
- Large gatherings with friends in the Vue Lounge
- Enjoy the cool summer nights relaxing by the outdoor fireplace
- Complimentary Wi-Fi in lounge areas
- Instant access to local highways and public transit throughout the region
- Guest suite available
- More intimate get-togethers in The Hideaway game room
- Host a barbecue on the outdoor commons patio
- Visit Marymoor Park and Lake Sammamish
- Shop and dine at Redmond Town Center with high-end retailers including REI and Macy's
- Get in The Zone where virtual personal fitness trainers Spin and Yoga classes are offered
- Local Art events such as Acts Out Outdoor Theatre
- Hit the Fit our state-of-the-art workout center
- Controlled access and garage parking
- Gear-up in the Bike Bar where bike storage and repair stations are available
- Explore the trail on the Sammamish River/Burke Gilman Trail with direct access from Allez
- Allez is a pet friendly community
- Completely smoke free environment
Pet Policy
Pets - Max 2 pets per home, $300 non-refundable pet fee
Comments: Pet rent: $25/per pet
Deposit: $200 refundable pet deposit
Maximum weight limit of 65 lbs fully grown
Office Hours
Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM
Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM
Allez
8397 158th Ave NE, Redmond, WA, 98052
